title: Boolean
description: Scalar component used to express truth: True or False, 0 or 1

referenceFrame.title: referenceFrame
referenceFrame.description: Frame of reference (usually temporal or spatial) with respect to which the value of the component is expressed. A reference frame anchors a value to a real world datum.

axisID.title: axisID
axisID.description: Specifies the reference axis (refer to gml:axisID). The reference frame URI should also be specified unless it is inherited from parent Vector

value.title: value
value.description: Value is optional, to enable structure to act as a schema for values provided using other encodings
